Text:
Unclear about whether this will work on Calibre or not, but on Kindle for PC it continues to crash immediately after opening. 

The fix that I developed involved changing the file extensions from .mobi to .azw which is another kindle format.

If you don't know how to do so simply google how to change file extensions as I don't remember how to change that in the settings.
calibre worked for me... i am enjoying this read on my iphone5. Thanks!!
